First: The first startup requires some preparation
SettingTips_1: Backup the configuration to prevent data loss. The configuration file name is setJson.json
SettingTips_2: How do I import the configuration?
SettingTips_3: A: Click to import the configuration and select the setJson.json file. You will be prompted that the import is successful, which means success.
SettingTips_5: * Note: The configuration file contains private information such as account password. It is strictly prohibited to send it to others at will and protect your own information
